name: RPG Plus - Desktop & Mobile Tabletop Roleplaying
name_original: RPG Plus - Desktop & Mobile Tabletop Roleplaying
description:
RPG Plus (RPG+) is the play-on-the-go app for players of role-playing-games. In these frenetic and busy days, it's hard to find time to meet up with friends and keep your RPG adventure going. RPG+ has been created to take the fun with you everywhere and no matter where your players are. It's an All-in-One solution: campaign manager, chat, character sheet and 3D and 2D map.

Thanks to its customizable design, RPG Plus (RPG+) can be used for any of your favourite RPGs. Fans of Pathfinder and D&D can enjoy a library of specific sheet templates and characteristic miniatures, and many more features and graphic elements will be uploaded periodically.

In RPG Plus (RPG+) you can:

- Create your campaign as gamemaster or join your friends as a player

- Design your story adding rooms (chats, maps, sheets) and selecting your players

- Make your own map for each adventure using the 3D builder system, add setting items and miniatures for the characters and keep track of the initiative with the turn manager

- Add realistic and intuitive 3D dynamic lighting system

- Upload and share an image to create 2D Maps

- Interact with the other player via chat: posting messages, rolling dice, sending stickers and sharing links

- Record your character's features in a digital sheet: choose among preloaded templates, build your own and even share templates with your group

You can play any old school, pen and paper roleplaying games, for example: dnd (including dnd 5e and Advanced Dungeon and Dragons Second Edition), Pathfinder, Pathfinder 2, Call of Cthulhu, Star Wars, Vampire: The Masquerade, World of Darkness, Shadowrun, Cyberpunk 2020, Mage the Ascension, Werewolf: the Apocalypse, GURPS,  Legend of the Five Rings, Warhammer.

Become a Patreon to unlock exclusive miniatures!!
